todos.text: Replace global scope in scripts with module export, import, and scope in CommonJS.
Replace multiple code, style, and image files with one bundle.
Write unit tests for pure functions.
Rewrite CommonJS modules as ECMAScript modules.
Delete redundant names in object literals via initializer shorthand.
Rewrite multiple occurrences of dot notation as object destructuring.
Rewrite multiple occurrences of bracket notation as array destructuring..
Replace array methods with ... spread operator for pure update.
Replace Object.assign with ... spread operator for pure update.
Move constructor and prototype functions into the class body.
Bind event handlers in class and function components.
Write callback functions to update the state of ancestor components.
Control the state of form components.
Compose components to reuse code and separate concerns.
